column2: Accordingly  the  Learned  High  Court  Judge  was  correct  in  refusing  to  entertain
another  bail  application  on  the  identical  grounds  for  the  same  petitioner.  Further
the Learned High Court Judge had  directed prison authorities to treat the  petitioner
if his  ilhess  could  not  be  treated  in

column1: Considering above,  we see no reason to revise the order of the Learned High Court
